import peachbox.scheduler
import time


[docs]class App(object):
    def __init__(self, name):
        self.name = name
        self.scheduler = peachbox.scheduler.Scheduler.Instance()


[docs]    def run(self):
        self.scheduler.run()
        while True:
            time.sleep(10)
